About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Full Stack Web Developer

Attended Ironhack Miami Coding Bootcamp from March 2020 to June 2020.

Ironhack is an immersive bootcamp with locations all over the globe, offering 9-week courses in Full Stack Web Development.

QLink Wireless

Front End Web Developer
  • Optimized checkout processes by re-architecting React components, integrating Google Pay and Affirm, and increasing user satisfaction.
  • Collaborated with T-Mobile developers to implement E911 APIs, ensuring precise location services for emergency calls.
  • Collaborated with designers using Adobe XD and Photoshop to transform complex UI concepts into functional, responsive web components.
  • Migrated ASP.NET components to React and Redux, reducing server-side requests and improving site performance.

Kaseya

Software Engineer
  • Enhanced workflow efficiency by developing the Autotask ticketing system, a key feature to streamline task management.
  • Reduced unwanted email impact by designing a robust spam filter, improving cybersecurity for thousands of users.
  • Simplified authentication by integrating Kaseya One Single Sign-On, enhancing security and user convenience.
  • Modernized legacy systems by transitioning HTML codebases to React, resulting in improved modularity and responsiveness.
  • Collaborated cross-functionally using Jira for task tracking and project management.
